title: Will a coyote try to get into your house? - Quora

response.answer_text: No. We have them everywhere around where I live. Now they've come next to the house crossing the yard into the pasture. I have 3 pear trees next to my house and one morning at daybreak there was one coyote jumping up to the lower limbs to snatch a pear! Damndest thing I ever saw. I was drinking coffee and watching out the window laughing at him. And no I didn't shoot him. Should have, as many fawns as they kill every year.

Not like a bear or mice and rats. Not very likely as far as I know. But. There was a story several years ago about a neighborhood coyote in the LA/San Fernando Valley area. A mated pair moved in under an empty house. It didn’t bother the neighbors. But it was a concern. Adding this:
